about_me.title: About Me...
paragraphs: My name is Miguel Arias and I am a fullstack developer.

Passionate about learning new things, I always strive to be better every day in all my personal areas and in my software development skills. I am currently looking for new job opportunities where I can contribute as much as possible with my current knowledge and skills and I am fully willing to learn.

cards.title: Design and Development Analyst - Support Area
cards.description: In this company, I performed many activities from creating stored procedures and implementing new functionalities in the creation of formats, data processing, and creation of banking reports. But mainly I worked in the technical support area, listening to and solving problems of banking clients, delving into and understanding the source code of the application and database.

cards.title: Fullstack Web Developer at Sipac
cards.description: In this company, I worked as a fullstack web developer where I developed web applications and enterprise management systems using technologies such as Laravel (php), Bootstrap, Jquery (JAVASCRIPT), and ORACLE DB (sql) for the development of web applications and enterprise management systems.

exzaltia.description: Exzaltia is a personal project in which an ecommerce for selling clothing products was developed, with user authentication, shopping cart, product categories and products, and an administration panel for managing products and categories.

pokearias.description: PokeArias is a web application created with the new Astro technology along with Typescript, where you can see all the statistics of the Pok√©mon with incredible transitions and in a very well-made and organized way.

acortarias.description: Acortarias is a URL shortener where you can shorten your web links, where this time you do not share intermediate advertising, but it is completely free and yet, a message from the creator is shared when traversing the URL, where you can share your life philosophy, your website, your social network, etc.

technologies.title: Technologies that i use in my projects

skills.title: What else do I have to offer?

items.title: Good English Proficiency
items.description: In these few years of my life, I have self-taught myself to speak and write in English fluently and with a good command of grammar and vocabulary.

items.title: Teamwork
items.description: I am a very collaborative person who always seeks to contribute to their team and help their colleagues in whatever they need, and I always seek to learn from others and improve my teamwork skills.

items.title: Ease of Learning
items.description: I love learning new things. My curiosity and ambition drive me to learn every day, and I always seek to learn from new experiences and the people around me. I always strive to improve my skills as a developer and in other areas of my life.

items.title: Excellent Communication
items.description: I am a person who has been highlighted on various occasions for being accurate, respectful, and clear in communication with the people around me.
